Member Function Documentation

double Function::evaluate ( const vector< double > &  pos  )  [virtual]

The evaluation function has to be present, since it is the decisive part of the function.

Reimplemented in Sphere, Rosenbrock, Rastrigin, Schaffer, Griewank, Ackley, Schwefel, Levy5, Freudenstein, Quadric, MovingGoal, MovingPeaks, Sinusoidal, and Zitzler3.

double Function::noisyEvaluate ( const vector< double > &  pos  ) 

Add noise to the evaluation of position pos.

The respective evaluate function is called within, and the current type of noise is added

Here is the call graph for this function:

double Function::addNoiseRelativeVal ( double  val  ) 

Scale value with noise.

Return f(x)*(1+noise)

Here is the call graph for this function:

bool Function::update ( int  step,
bool  goal = false 
) [virtual]

Change the function behaviour, for dynamic functions.

Parameters:
step  The current step compared to moveFrequency
goal  Whether the function given goal value is reached

Reimplemented in MovingPeaks, Sinusoidal, and Zitzler3.

void Function::set_moveDistance ( double  moveDistance_in  )  [virtual]

Set the moveDistance for the optimization function during runtime.

The moveDistance is given as a fraction of the initialization space moving_peaks() overrides

Reimplemented in MovingPeaks.

Member Data Documentation

SequenceGenerator* Function::moveSequence [protected]

The move of the randomOptMove function is defined.

Since the sequence is seeded it is repeatable.

double Function::min_x [protected]

Dimension of the search space, Initial Particle Positions are chosen from that range.

double Function::max_x [protected]

double Function::min_v [protected]

Dimension of the initial velocities, Initial Particle Positions are chosen from that range.

double Function::max_v [protected]

double Function::goal [protected]

The goal value to be reached, given by standard benchmarks.

double Function::opt [protected]

The global optimum value.

int Function::dim [protected]

The function dimension.

vector<double> Function::optPos [protected]

The position of the optimum.

double Function::moveDistance [protected]

For dynamic functions the velocity of the moving optimum.

int Function::moveFrequency [protected]

The frequency with which changes of the function occur.

every moveFrequency steps

int Function::nextMoveStep [protected]

Next random move step.

optimumMoveStyle_type Function::optimumMoveStyle [protected]

For dynamic functions, the way the opt position is moved.

either random within moveDistance, or linear in each dimension moveDistance is added

dynamicStyle_type Function::dynamicStyle [protected]

Either a staticFct or a dynamicFct.

For dynamicFct the update method is used

noiseStyle_type Function::noiseStyle [protected]

The kind of noise added to the function.

For a noisy function noisyEvaluate is called instead of evaluate from evalFunc

double Function::noiseSigma [protected]

The sigma parameter for the gaussian noise.

updateStyle_type Function::updateStyle [protected]

The dynamic function is either updated periodically or when the function goal is reached.

The periodical update is done every moveFrequency steps and the onGoal update once the given goal value is reached
